instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chimes but stays on black screen. check new screen, bios, checked pins on lvds and l9080. nothing works

thoughts? TIA

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message:
First put back original BIOS!

Diode mode on pins 4,6,7 with and without LCD connected.
<SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> high?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message:
with plugged in 

4 0.37

6 0.47

7 0.52


without plugged in 

4 0.32

6 0.55

7 0.56

<SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> is 3.3v and 0.54 diode

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: Is there 3V on <CAPACITOR>C9015</CAPACITOR>, LCD connected of course.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: Then there must me backlight or some sort of image. Measure all LVDS lines on diode mode at the LVDS connector, LCD disconnected.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: there is backlight. no image though

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: sorry i wasnt clear on that

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: Answer the rest of my questions.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen w/backlight but chimes
threads.message: If those values are without an LCD connected then it is either a bad LCD/LCD cable or connector.
